author: Meryl Kornfield
title: California, Florida release names of nursing homes with coronavirus cases as pressure mounts - Washington Post
description:
1. California, Florida release names of nursing homes with coronavirus cases as pressure mounts  Washington Post

content:
California officials said their list is only partial. Some other states, such as New York and Georgia, also have released partial lists, while many others, such as New Jersey, have not publicly reported any nursing homes that have had cases.
